content.title: Add Image Widget to Segment
content.body:
1. From the bottom left of your Iris, navigate to the Default Library tab.
  2. Next to the Default Library, you will see the My Libraries tab and a search icon . Click the search icon.
  3. In the search bar that appears, enter Image.
  4. From the results, under Default, select Image.
  5. Drag the Image widget onto employeeSegment on the canvas.
  6. From the Project explorer, right-click on the new image and select Rename.
  7. Rename the Image employeeImage.
